title: Collabify | Enterprise Project Intelligence
metaDesc: Collabify unifies planning, execution, and reporting so teams deliver faster with full visibility, analytics, and secure collaboration.
heroHeadline: Precision project intelligence for modern teams.
heroSubtitle: Unify strategy, execution, and reporting across every portfolio with real-time visibility, automation, and secure collaboration.
heroHighlight1: Portfolio-wide visibility across every initiative and owner.
heroHighlight2: Automated risk signals, dependencies, and status rollups.
heroHighlight3: Audit-ready security with granular access controls.
statsNote: Aggregated from active customers over the past 12 months.
workflowSubtitle: From kickoff to closeout, every detail aligned.
workflowStep1Text: Capture objectives, budgets, and ownership across every program.
workflowStep2Text: Create roadmaps, dependencies, and staffing plans in minutes.
workflowStep3Text: Automate status, risk flags, and stakeholder updates.
workflowStep4Text: Deliver board-ready insights with live metrics and narrative.
capabilitiesSubtitle: Everything you need to run a high-precision PMO.
capability1Text: One surface for roadmaps, tasks, files, and approvals.
capability2Text: Standardize delivery and eliminate manual status chasing.
capability4Text: Track velocity, cost, and outcome impact in real time.
capability5Text: Tie every initiative to outcomes and strategic themes.
capability6Text: Model scenarios and forecast delivery confidence.
commandBullet2: Automated alerts for schedule or budget drift.
story1Quote: We consolidated 12 portfolios into one view and finally hit our deadlines.
story2Quote: Collabify replaced five tools and gave our execs a single source of truth.
story3Quote: Our PMO gained confidence by seeing risks before they hit production.
securitySubtitle: Enterprise safeguards without slowing you down.
security1Text: AES-256 at rest and TLS 1.2+ in transit across all environments.
security2Text: Granular roles, SSO, and audit logs for regulated teams.
faq1Question: How fast can we onboard a portfolio?
faq1Answer: Most teams launch within two weeks using templates and guided migration.
faq2Answer: Yes. Roll up programs by business unit, region, or strategic theme.
faq3Question: Can we customize workflows and approvals?
faq3Answer: Absolutely. Configure stages, rules, and notifications per team.
faq4Question: What security standards do you support?
faq4Answer: We align to SOC 2 and GDPR requirements with optional data residency.
finalCTASubtitle: Bring your entire portfolio into focus with Collabify.
